definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Pick accuracy is affected by the mechanics of a gantry -style machine.
sentences.chinese: 門吊式貼裝機的拾取精度受其機械結構影響。

sentences.english: Icon Packager is a great software to change icons.
sentences.chinese: 圖標包裝機是一個偉大的軟件更改圖標。

sentences.english: This project is a 6MW hydropower project, located in Yunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 裝機的水電項目，地點位於雲南省境內。

sentences.english: The Tea-bag Packing Machine model SD-DPC-81 have added automatic boxing device instead of envelope packing system.
sentences.chinese: 型包裝機減掉了外袋封裝機構，增加了自動入盒裝置。

sentences.english: Its rate for loading is more than 300 boxes an hour.
sentences.chinese: 裝箱速度每小時300箱以上，能和各種灌裝機配套。

sentences.english: Most amateur radio operators build their own equipment.
sentences.chinese: 大多數無線電業餘愛好者都是自己裝機子。

sentences.english: Packaging Machines for Grain, Liquid, Powder and Tablet.
sentences.chinese: 全自動顆粒，液體，粉劑和片劑等包裝機。

sentences.english: In this 9% share, hydro power installed capacity contributed 172 thousand megawatt, world's biggest, and wind power 12.17 thousand megawatt, world's fourth.
sentences.chinese: 風電裝機爲1217萬千瓦，居世界第四位。

sentences.english: This adds up more than 5,000 kWp of installed solar power.
sentences.chinese: 太陽能發電總裝機容量超過5000千瓦。

sentences.english: Mecafill VKPV-CF guarantees absolute accuracy in terms of fill level.
sentences.chinese: CF灌裝機在灌裝時能保證絕對精確的灌裝高度。

sentences.english: He points out that channel checks should have caught such a massive leap in installed capacity.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，應該對裝機容量的大幅增加進行渠道檢查。

sentences.english: Heat shrinkable packaging machine is currently using more of a packaging machinery.
sentences.chinese: 熱收縮包裝機是目前使用比較多的一種包裝機械。

sentences.english: In the packaging machine, synchronous control is a considerable problem.
sentences.chinese: 在捲紙封裝機中，存在送料過程中的同步控制題目。

sentences.english: I am looking for cup sealing machines.
Heat shrink packaging machine is one of the most widely used packaging machines nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 熱收縮包裝機是目前使用比較多的一種包裝機械。
